SELECT BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd, FlowRulePtrnDesc FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd) ROWNUMBER, BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd, FlowRulePtrnDesc FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBR04
BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchbjobBzwkPrcssDstcd# || '%'
FlowRulePtrnDesc LIKE '%' || #searchflowRulePtrnDesc# || '%'
) TMP WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd) AS "TotalCount" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBR04
BjobBzwkPrcssDstcd LIKE '%' || #searchbjobBzwkPrcssDstcd# || '%'
FlowRulePtrnDesc LIKE '%' || #searchflowRulePtrnDesc# || '%'
